annotation.spannedText: 76 M w/Rheumatoid Arthritis on Humira and Methotrexate, diastolic heart failure, atrial fibrillation with p/w hypoxic respiratory failure s/p VATS and Lingula/LLL biopsy, bx c/w UIP. #. Hypoxic respiratory failure: continue with 6L NC oxygen, titrate as tolerated. -change liquid bactrim to po -f/u sputum cultures -d/c steroids -uptitrate O2 prior to patient moving -appreciate thoracics involvement; pt with worsening PTX after pneumostat placed thus placed on suction now on water seal with plan to go home on water seal #. Afib: - continue dig for rate control - restart metoprolol 12.5 mg po TID for rate control #. Rheumatoid arthritis: - hold methotrexate and humira #. Macrocytic Anemia: Unclear etiology. Consider anemia of chronic disease. MTX could be contributory. B12 and folate WNL. - trend hct for now - guaiac all stools #. CHF: rate control as above, preserved EF # Nutrition: - pleasure feeds # Dispo: family meeting, d/w palliative care home w/ hospice; plan for home with hospice tomorrow ICU Care Nutrition: thickened liquids Glycemic Control: Lines: 20 Gauge - [**2120-6-5**] 04:00 PM
